Command Reference¶

jdma command [command] [arg] [options]

Options:

[-h|--help]
[-e|--email=EMAIL]
[-w|--workspace=WORKSPACE]
[-l|--label=LABEL]
[-r|--target=TARGET]
[-s|--storage=STORAGE]
[-n|--limit=LIMIT]
[-d|--digest]
[-j|--json]
[-t|--simple]
[-f|--force]
